name: Pop Those Clones
description:
This is our submission for the Weekly Game Jam 202: Clones.

We started with the idea of having a character clone itself to make a stack that helped it save obstacles and reach the end of the level. We thought of a few more mechanics that what you see in game, but in the end this is what we had time to make. We're proud of it anyway as we managed to give it a well-rounded finish, we think.

Thank you for playing!

Credits:
  • Made by Hyperfocused Games
    • Art and other creative stuff by Luu (Twitter)
    • Code and other Godot stuff by Dani (Twitter)
  • Music by Mandy.B.Blue (Twitter)
  • "Level Win" Sound effect from Freesound
